name: Giant Eagle
desc: A giant eagle is a noble creature that speaks its own language and understands speech in the Common tongue. A mated pair of giant eagles typically has up to four eggs or young in their nest (treat the young as normal eagles).
languages: Giant Eagle, understands Common and Auran but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
